metadata.synopsis: The Harper Inspecter is either looking over a batch of prisoners who've just arrived in Moonrise or has just finished inspecting them and is walking away when the player intercepts him. A gruff and suspicious guard.
metadata.how_to_trigger: -Use Debug Book to teleport to Act 2 -> Haven -> Outside checkpoint.- Go through checkpoint dialogue and enter Haven.- Walk to dock underneath the inn.- Use oe command oe prisonersreturn to spawn Harper and prisoners- Go through the arrival dialog. When the dialog ends and the Harper starts to inspect the prisoners, speak to him.

0.speaker: Harper Arthus
0.text: Keep your distance. Let's not confuse the parasite.
